title: When you identify people on Boards by their icon
body:
And you try to read the comment sections during this Chaos/Order event...

https://media.giphy.com/media/bal0OZzvIWGoU/giphy.gif

HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO KNOW WHO YOU ARE WHEN YOU'RE ALL USING THE SAME ICONS?!?!?!

replies.body: OH MY GOD, RIGHT?!

but i kept my old diamond icon

i see you're a man of culture as well
oh rubick EVERYONE knows who you are after the meddler burn.

The Meddler burn?

I believe this is something I should see. Might I have the source?
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/mg1RWfwL-meddler-we-dont-know-yet-if-ancient-coin-is-weak-or-if-frost-queen-is-overpowered
Thank you. Totally worth it.
Good
Oh rubick trying to hide after the burn?

stop being pathetic already, it was fun at first and it isn't anymore

i couldn't care less about all this cinema, i already did my escuses to meddler and the close people to me know how i respect him, i would never missquote him on purpose 

if i wanted to hide i wouldn't choose this obvious nickname as i'm the only adc darius player on earth

if people know me because of that incident, then like i said

Good
let them know me

I'm either the dragon rocket or the zombie slayer pantheon icon...

Unless you're using F.E.K.
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/010/244/The_great_cornholi.jpg
Second that, brother.

Team Riven suckz!

EDIT: Holy shit, someone actually took it seriously, lol.

Team Yasuo suckz too.

Order vs. Chaos only works in the Warcraft franchise, it's too overrated every else.
Oh thank god I'm not the only one. I saw a Big Lincoln comment the other day and didn't realize it was him at first. Same goes for the new Wardens and their fancy icons.
u are a crab
I do like krebs
i shall change my icon to the all mighty scuttler
We need more scuttlecrab icons
i have done it now it just needs to sync with my boards profile
are you feeling it now mr. krabs?

Scuttie crab is new poro.

Make fan art turning champions into scuttie crabs.
I hear they have a pretty good cycle.
Thats a nice icon howd you get it

Thanks! 

During the last winter event you got it by gifting something to a friend.
Just post some top quality Jinx ~~porn~~ memes and you'll at least know me {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
It makes me kinda sad I can't use my usual Nami or SG Poro icon during the event but I gotta show that Order pride

> [{quoted}](name=Saewin,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MMskG25t,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-18T12:46:36.008+0000)
>
> It makes me kinda sad I can't use my usual Nami or SG Poro icon during the event but I gotta show that Order pride

Same tho.
Just get F.E.K. and use a custom avatar of the riven/yasuo deal while retaining your real icon to non-fek users.
I'am the Wraith guy.
http://imgur.com/5tCjged.gif?nodirect

http://i.imgur.com/bofUVay.gif?noredirect
Just know I am the Thor upvote man.
You are most guilty of these icon switching shenanigans my friend.
use LoL FEK and problem solved
I already use FEK, as I have mentioned in other comments. The problem is, not everyone has an avatar. So, I still can't recognize the majority of people on the Boards.

funny thing is that i had turned off FEK when i made the comment n didnt realize it was u

im such a hypocrite
_**HAH!**_ You see? It isn't easy when you're too lazy to read usernames!
But we'll always know who the man the with screaming Sion is.
I need my {{champion:266}} icon Rito so I can finally be understood and my work is not called a hack job

Get FEK?

Those who have avatars will override the Summoner icon.
I have FEK. Not everyone has an avatar.
When I'm not doing the daily bonus I carry around the good ol' santa baron.

I do the same... Then I realised I'm contributing to the problem...

I go by the minion icon :^)

Excuse me Mr *Glory In Death*, are you NA's Tilterella?
What rank are you on the cheese scale?
Nah, I'm just a lowly Sion Support OTP who just barely got into Plat. Although I do enjoy my cheese. I'll steal 2 of your camps, even when I'm a support!

So is that a 2/10?
*Writes on notepad*
Alrighty, anymore plat^ Sion mains?
and fek has frequent break downs at the same time/ not all avatars reuploaded.
At least I haven't seen anyone else use this one yet in-game.

Why do you need to know?
https://media.giphy.com/media/T8Dhl1KPyzRqU/giphy.gif

I need it!

https://media.giphy.com/media/xUD3FZUSGvtFS/giphy.gif
